channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 16:30 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Watch for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 16:30 Return the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Watch for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:11 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 16:11 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Marganets and Marhanetsky Territorial Community, Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Pokrovsk Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
